USPS is the preferred method. If you send your
package only 2 weeks in advance, use UPS. It
will take at least 2 weeks regardless of method.

25lbs (11 kg) limit on all packages. Be sure to
mark with your estimated time of arrival (ETA). All packages will be held 30 days past ETA, then put
in the hiker box.

properties.name: Drakesbad Guest Ranch - 1353.3mi
properties.desc:
Mail Drop:

- Distance from trail: 0.5mi
- Section: N9Comment:
Drakesbad is a designated mail drop, approved by the National Park Service, with mail available 24/7.

Hikers Name
c/o Drakesbad Guest Ranch
End of Warner Valley Road
Chester, California 96020
Estimated day of arrival

Hikersare welcomed anytime for meals (low cost), logistic (transport tomedical facilities), clean up, (shower or tub) laundry, relaxation inhot spring pool. Drakesbad is within 40 miles from the halfway mark anda good reason for celebration.National Park Service campground is in1/4 mile distance right on the PCT.

Larger groups please advise us of your arrival in advance by calling 530 529 1512 Ext. 120 and leave message.

Billie and Ed Fiebiger
Ranch Host
Drakesbad Guest Ranch

email: billie@goldrush.com
web: www.drakesbad.com (http://www.drakesbad.com)

properties.name: Fish Lake Resort - 1780.4mi
properties.desc:
2mi walk on side trail or hitch on Hwy 140
Small Store
Distance from trail: 1.25
Section: OR B9

UPS Only! No outgoing mail:

Your Name
c/o Fish Lake Resort
State Hwy 140, Mile Marker 30
Medford, OR 97503
ETA: (Estimated date of arrival)

Our tent rates are for a group of up to 4 people. So, it would be$18.00 for a no hook up sites. However, there is a free PCT hiker spotabout a 1/4 mile or less from the campground. Most of the PCT hikersstay there. We have a few who stay here, but why not save your money?We do have pay showers & laundry as well as the cafe & a gameroom with a TV if you want to catch up on what's going on in the world.

We are very hiker friendly. We accept hiker boxes for a$5.00 fee & we have a hiker scavenger box where you can take orleave whatever you need or don't want anymore.

www.fishlakeresort.net (http://www.fishlakeresort.net)

properties.name: Elk Lake Resort - 1958.3mi
properties.desc:
Distance from trail: 1.00
Section: OR E7
No Resupply

Drop shipping packages: we charge a handling fee at time of pick up. Weaccept UPS or FedEx packages only at the resort. Do not send via the USPostal Service unless you give us a couple weeks lead-time. These willend up going to Bend instead of the resort. We only go to town once aweek to pick up P.O. Box packages. Make sure the package is critterproof (mouse/chipmunk) so try to box in a hard plastic tote.

Address to:
Elk Lake Resort,
Attn: (your name) PCT Hiker
60,000 Century Dr.
Bend, OR 97701

At the bottom of the package, an estimated time of arrival would be good.

If you have to send: US Postal Service: Elk Lake Resort, P.O. Box 698, Bend, OR 97709.

Contact:
Web: www.elklakeresort.net/pct.php (http://www.elklakeresort.net/pct.php)
Elk Lake Resort
541-480-7378
jwalsh@elklakeresort.net

From May 15 to Oct 1 the Stehekin PO has the
following schedule:

Mail arrives daily beginning May 15.
Mon. 7:30-4:00 closed from 12:00 to 12:30
Tues. 10:00-4:00
Wed. 10:00-4:00
Thurs.10:00-4:00
Fri. 7:30-4:00 closed from 12:00 to 12:30
Sat: 11:30-12:30

The office also closes to pick up and deliver
mail at the boat landing. Mail Those times
will be posted at the office. From July 1 to
Oct 1 the mail comes in at 10:45 and goes out
on the late boat. Mail close-out is at 3:30.
